mapper.select: SELECT m.personId, m.password, m.name, m.email, m.point, m.del, m.social, ro.role_id, ro.role_name FROM person m LEFT JOIN person_role mr ON m.person_id = mr.person_id LEFT JOIN role ro ON mr.role_id = ro.role_id WHERE m.person_id = #{personId}
